page.title: 02EASTRIGGS PUBLIC SERVICES
page.content: ELECTRICITY from grid, distributed by SSEB GAS none in Eastriggs WATER from Winterhope Reservoir, map ref. 03270582. REFUSE taken weekly by District Council to Corsehill, near Annan. STREET CLEANING manually, by District Council worker; and every 2_4 weeks by Council sweeper vehicle FIRE BRIGADE Annan and Gretna, manned by volunteers. POLICE Annan and Gretna LIBRARY open 12 hours per week POST OFFICE Sub (in shop); main Post Office in Annan TELEPHONES 2 kiosks. SCHOOL Primary. Secondary education at Annan Academy HEALTH CARE Annan/Gretna Doctors here twice weekly. Baby and chiropody clinics fortnightly.
